name: Calculus
description: This course introduces students to the principles of calculus. Students will learn about limits, derivatives, and integrals.

name: Linear Algebra
description: This course introduces students to the principles of linear algebra. Students will learn about vectors, matrices, and transformations.

name: Probability Theory
description: This course introduces students to the principles of probability theory. Students will learn about random variables, distributions, and expectation.

name: Mathematical Statistics
description: This course introduces students to the principles of mathematical statistics. Students will learn about estimation, hypothesis testing, and regression analysis.

name: Multivariate Analysis
description: This course introduces students to the principles of multivariate analysis. Students will learn about principal component analysis, factor analysis, and cluster analysis.

name: Time Series Analysis
description: This course introduces students to the principles of time series analysis. Students will learn about autocorrelation, ARIMA models, and forecasting.
